reviewText: So happy I got this! I love this dvd!
I am a fan of bret micheals i have been lucky enough to meet him in person before he is a pretty cool guy
just as described, don't get better than hard and heavy!! highly recommend! if you love bret or metal a must have!

The Bret Michaels DVD featurs four brand new, never-before-seen, acoustic performances from Bret Michaels, including 2 classic Poison hits "Every Rose Has Its Thorn" and "Something To Believe In", and 2 of his solo songs "All I Ever Needed" and "Driven". All 4 songs are taken from his solo album "Freedom of Sound" and the 2 solo songs also feature on "Rock My World" his latest album. The DVD from Time Life also includes behind-the-scenes footage, rare photos and in-depth interviews with the lead singer of Poison.
This DVD was a part of the Hard & Heavy CD/DVD collection from Time Life which was advertised by Bret Michaels on tv. The DVD is great but would've been even better if it was a little longer for example Bret's 4 music videos ("Raine","All I Ever Needed","Go That Far" and "Fallen") could've been included on the DVD which would've made it perfect.
